description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A young boy has run away from his parents. Well not run away so much as fly away in a balloon. Guide the boy safely through the dangerous skies and away from his troubles. Compete against the world with global high scores. Only you can boost TV news ratings!
